Key.English: The ACE drag and carry modules aren't available because ACE dragging isn't loaded.
Multiple ACE medical related functions aren't available because ACE medical isn't loaded.
The radio range module isn't available because TFAR isn't loaded.
The RHS APS module isn't available because RHS AFRF isn't loaded.
If enabled and a unit is selected, his entire group is also selected.
If enabled and the units selected are in vehicles, it will dismount them and paradrop them without their vehicles.
When players join in progress (JIP), it will automatically apply this setting.
You can use this whilst as a curator to change yourself.
Allows the changing of '%1' chat & VON.
Includes the entire group of the AI on which the module was placed.
Select sides/groups/players. Module can also be placed on a player.
If no, it selects the object the module was placed on and places items in its inventory. Units are excluded from this.
Allow passengers to dismount while in combat.
Allow crews to dismount while in combat.
Allow crews to stay in immobile vehicles.
Makes the AI able to turn out or not.
A non-AI driver is already present
Spawns an AI driver that is controlled by the commander of the vehicle.\nRequires a player commander.
If you want to apply invulnerability to an already existing driver, you must remove the driver and make a new one.
Spawns in x amount of each weapon compatible magazines for each unit (not x total!).
Allows ammo that is normally blacklisted to be spawned in.
Spawns in x amount of predefined magazines (not x total!).
Sets the captivity status of the selected unit.
Select AI from the list to change captivity status.
Changed units' captivity status in group
No alive AI units were found
Make a vehicle into a car bomb. Starting the engine will trigger the car bomb.
Changes the size of the explosion.
Made vehicle into a car bomb
Changed channel visibility on selected players
An array that contains all allowed explosives/items used for breaching.
Sets the explosives list for everyone.
Saves the explosives list to your profile.
Resets the explosives list above to the default.
More damage will usually cause more wounds.
Various types of damages produce different results.
You must be a logged-in admin to be able to use this module
Only the first selected side will be taken into account.
Allows the dog to attack the given sides. If none are selected, it will attack no one and will be peaceful.
The dog will search within the given radius for targets.
How much damage the dog deals.
Spawns a lightning bolt where the module is placed.
Adds thunder. This causes damage though, as it's like the Zeus bolt.
Turns off animal AI behaviour and pathing. Only applies if dog is peaceful.
Sets the dog's name. If left blank, a random name will be chosen.
Enables the dragging of an object.
Enables the carrying of an object.
Ignores the weight limit for dragging if enabled.
Ignores the weight limit for carrying if enabled.
Changed ACE Drag and Carry abilities
Enables the dragging of a dead body.
Changes ACE body dragging on selected corpse only or all dead units.
If selected, player corpses will also be able to be dragged.
Apply to all future dead units
Enables/Disables the dragging of all future dead bodies.\nTakes 'Include Player corpses' setting into account.
No dead bodies without ACE Drag Body were found
No dead bodies with ACE Drag Body were found
Added ACE Drag Body to body
Added ACE Drag Body to all bodies
Removed ACE Drag Body from body
Removed ACE Drag Body from all bodies
Enabled ACE Drag Body on all future player bodies
Enabled ACE Drag Body on all future player bodies
Added ACE Drag Body to all future bodies
Disabled ACE Drag Body from all future bodies
Determines how many particles are spawned. 0 turns off script.
If yes, it will open another dialog after this one is closed to change the weather.
Turned Dust Storm Script on for player
Turned Dust Storm Script off for player
Dust Storm Script JIP setting changed
Turned Dust Storm Script on for selected players
Turned Dust Storm Script off for selected players
Choose 'Low' to turn off grass rendering. Choose 'Standard' if you want to render it again.
Grass rendering changed on selected players
Allows you to store multiple presets of loadouts. Profiles names are case insensitive. DO NOT USE PUNCUATION MARKS.
Allows you to select a preset to edit and apply.
Place the array of loadouts here if you are importing a profile.
Resets saved loadouts in currently selected preset.
Deletes the currently selected preset. If you chose a preset in the current window, it will delete that one.
Preset '%1' has been exported to your clipboard
No preset name was provided for import
Are you sure you want to overwrite preset '%1'?
You can't delete the default preset
Riflemen, Crew, etc. Delete empty array and then paste loadout.
Squad leaders, Team leaders. Delete empty array and then paste loadout.
Anti-tank gunners, Anti-tank assistants. Delete empty array and then paste loadout.
Anti-air operators, Anti-air assistants. Delete empty array and then paste loadout.
Autoriflemen, Machine Gunners. Delete empty array and then paste loadout.
Medics, Combat Life Savers. Delete empty array and then paste loadout.
Engineers, Demo. Delete empty array and then paste loadout.
Use this line to apply with Gear Set to Single Unit. Delete empty array and then paste loadout.
Select sides/groups. Group will have priority over side. It will disregard player selection.
Invincibility will be applied with the modifier below.
Sets what type of action is applied to all players at scenario end.
All weapons are removed from every player.
Disables player movement and user input. Requires ACE.
Text that will show up in the debriefing screen.
Module is turned off in CBA settings
Added curator stats to RPT log
Paradrops units (AI or players) selected by the Zeus using the ZEN context menu.
Takes vehicles with players and paradrops them both together, crew staying inside. Applies to players only.
Takes players only out of their vehicles and paradrops the players only.
Determines how far up units are paradropped over terrain level.
Determines how far apart units are paradropped from each other.
Stores their backpacks and gives them parachutes automatically. Upon landing units get their backpacks back.
Object already has paradrop action removed
Sets time acceleration to a minimum and reverts time every 100s. Disable whilst skipping time.
Select AI from the list to remove grenades from.
Removed grenades from units in group
Allows you to change the APS (Active Protection System) on a vehicle with RHS APS.
Changes APS on selected object only or all vehicles with RHS APS.
Enables/Disables RHS APS for all future vehicles.
All vehicles already had RHS APS enabled
Enabled RHS APS on all vehicles
All vehicles already had RHS APS disabled
Disabled RHS APS on all vehicles
Place on a vehicle with RHS APS
Vehicle already had RHS APS enabled
Vehicle already had RHS APS disabled
Enabled RHS APS for all future vehicles
Disabled RHS APS for all future vehicles
Make a unit into a suicide bomber. To trigger its explosvies, the Zeus must remote control the unit.
If the unit has a dead man switch, the unit will detonate its explosives if the unit goes unconscious or dies.
Determines how far a radio can transmit. Default is 1.
Determines from how far a radio can receive. Default is 1.
Are you sure you want to force toggle consciousness on '%1'? He is in Cardiac Arrest.
Makes the vehicle not blow up when receiving critical damage but still allows for vulnerability.
Vehicle explosion prevention has been enabled
Vehicle explosion prevention has been disabled
Vehicle already has this feature enabled
Vehicle already has this feature disabled
Select unit. Module can also be placed on a unit.
Adds/removes tracking from the selected unit.
Displays notification in the zeus interface.
Unit is no longer being tracked
Allows you select different categories of magazines.
Allows Zeuses to leave an unconscious remote controlled unit by pressing the ESCAPE key.
If enabled, it will make floating objects due to building destruction fall to the ground.\nWARNING: This is performance intensive.

If enabled, all objects placed and deleted by the player's curator will be kept track of.\nIf turned off, it will remove everything related to the counter, but not resetting the counter in the process.
Enable automatic blacklist detection for FK servers
Allows the automatic adoption of the premade blacklist on FK servers. FK is an EU based unit.
Filters whatever is in the box out of the resupply crate, only applies to the 'Spawn Ammo Resupply for unit' module. Must be an array of strings.
Used for the 'Spawn Ammo Resupply Crate' module. Must be an array of strings.
Enable ACE Dragging missing addon hint
Enable ACE Medical missing addon hint
Enable Radio Range Script missing addon hint
Enable RHS APS Script addon missing hint
Allows to toggle the hint on or off.
